content:
What wonderful news! Congratulations to your sister and your entire family on the upcoming addition! A fruit salad with whipped cream is a great way to celebrate this joyful occasion. It's a light, refreshing, and sweet way to mark the moment.

I'm sure your family will appreciate the thought and love that goes into preparing a special dessert to celebrate your sister's pregnancy. It's a beautiful way to share in the excitement and joy of this new addition to your family.

Remember to take a moment to cherish the time with your loved ones and enjoy the celebration together. The fruit salad will be a lovely touch to the evening, and I'm sure it will be a memorable night for everyone.

If you need any help with the fruit salad or any other aspect of your family dinner, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you and your family have a wonderful time celebrating this special news together!
